abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel announces dismissal of Capt John Nettleton, officer who has commanded the Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, naval base since 2012; does not detail reasons but cites conduct investigation.
lead_paragraph: The commander of the United States naval base at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, has been relieved of his duties because of a loss of confidence in his ability to command.
snippet: The commander of the United States naval base at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, has been relieved of his duties because of a loss of confidence in his ability to command.

headline.main: Commander of Naval Base Relieved of Duty at Guantánamo
